title: FS: T213 Type 2 Collection - Cobb, Mathewson, Speaker, Lajoie, etc...
author: Donavon

posts.post_title: FS: T213 Type 2 Collection - Cobb, Mathewson, Speaker, Lajoie, etc...
posts.post_content:
As much as it breaks my heart to do this, my entire collection of T213-2's is for sale. Most are either pop. 1 highest graded or at the top of the pops. These are some of the finest T213's in existence and they represent the finest all time collection according to the PSA set registry. The eye appeal of all present higher than the grades. Here is the list:

GRADED:

Roger Bresnahan (Chicago) - PSA 3  - $200 
Roger Bresnahan (Toledo) - PSA 3  -  $225 
Ty Cobb (Bat Off Shoulder) - PSA 3 (Much Nicer)  -  $2500 
Eddie Collins (Philadelphia A on Shirt) - PSA 5  -  $1500 
Larry Doyle (Batting) - PSA 3  -  $150 
Miller Huggins (Hands at Mouth) - PSA 2 (Much Nicer)  -  $200 
Napoleon Lajoie (Cleveland) - PSA 4  -  $1500 
Rube Marquard (Pitching NY) - PSA 3  -  $250 
Rube Marquard (Portrait NY) - PSA 2 (Much Nicer)  -  ON HOLD
Christy Mathewson - PSA 3  -  $750
George McQuillan (Pittsburgh) - PSA 4  -  $150
Chief Meyers (NY Fielding) - PSA 4 (MK) (Pencil mark on back)  -  $125
Dots Miller - PSA 4  -  $150
Germany Schaefer (KC Fed. W on Shirt) - PSA 4.5 (Very Rare)  -  $350
Tris Speaker - PSA 4  -  $1500
Joe Tinker (Chicago Fed. Bat Off Shoulder) - PSA 2 (Much Nicer)  -  $200
Jack Warhop (New York) - PSA 3 (Much Nicer)  -  $150
Zach Wheat (Brooklyn Nat.) - PSA 4  -  $600

RAW:

Russ Ford (Buffalo Fed.) - Looks VG or better  -  $75
John McGraw (Portrait) - Looks VG or better  -  $200
Rube Oldring (Philadelphia Amer.) - Good or better  -  $60
Ed Summers (Brooklyn Fed.) - No creases / Small paper loss on back  -  $85
Bill Sweeney (Chicago Nat.) - Good or better  -  $85
Ira Thomas (Philadelphia Amer.) - VG or better  -  $85

Here is a link to a slideshow of the cards:

[url]http://s416.photobucket.com/albums/pp241/gandhi081876/T213%20Coupons%20Type%202/?albumview=slideshow[/url]

Please email me at [url]donavonarabie@yahoo.com[/url] for prices and additional high res. scans. I will also consider selling the collection as a whole if the price is right.

Thanks,
Donavon

Email sent on several cards.
Dave
High resolution scans have been sent to those that requested them. Thanks.

Donovan,

I also have sent an email.


Thanks,


Patrick

Have listed prices (includes S & H) for those who have asked. I am willing to entertain reasonable offers.

Thanks,
Donavon
